text: Trenni Kusnierek is a sportscaster formally with MLB Network. She currently works for WJTM-AM as a sports anchor. She also worked at WDJT-TV as a sports anchor. She also worked for FSN Pittsburgh for the Pittsburgh Pirates and FSN Wisconsin for the Milwaukee Brewers. He is the current sideline reporter for Green Bay Packers preseason telecasts with Kevin Harlan and Rich Gannon. Kusnierek is a former studio host and reporter for MLB Network. Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:Living people Category:1977 births
title: Trenni Kusnierek
